name: Can you save yourself?
description:
Can you save yourself is a tower defense game mixed with first person shooter in witch you must defend yourself from aliens that try to stop you from destroying their world by leaching their minerals from the ground that you need to survive. Shoot, slash and search your way through the 7 difficulty levels and escape the dying planet in your ship.

FEATURES

 *Kill aliens with guns or slash them with your katana

 *Search for pieces of your ship in the nearby area

*Make defensive turrets with materials and let them do the work

GAMEPLAY

Gameplay is fairly simple, don't let the aliens destroy your ship or kill you while you wait for the ship to drain the planet dry of resources, construct laser or minigun turrets that help you in defending and search the nearby area for materials, upgraded guns and parts of the ship.

CONTROLS

WASD - Basic player movement.

SHIFT - Sprinting for

V - Switch to melee

Mouse - Camera control, aiming and shooting

CREDITS

Krešimir Kučan - Lead programer

Ante Tavra - Ai programer

Domagoj Petrović - Programer

 Alen Brebrić - Prop design
